(3, ' 2 --> Volunteer: Web Developer VotingSmarter Newport Beach, CA VotingSmarter is a civic tech nonprofit. We are founded on the idea that in order to fight voter apathy, political corruption, misinformation and paralyzing partisanship we must address the incentives that cause them. That starts with "cheaper" and fairer information. Everything we do is centered on being fair, fast, and fun. Be began by fighting voter apathy in 2020. We built a "dating app for elections" that matched thousands of voters to the political candidates that matched their political preferences rather than political party or immutable characteristics like race, age, or gender identity. Since the 2020 election, we’ve been designing a tool to fight the political corruption created by large corporate donations and lobbying. We are super excited to announce that after months of development and thousands of hours of research, our new Chrome extension that matches shoppers to the companies that donate to candidates that share their political values has been approved and is live in the Google Chrome Store!!! Who We Are Our team is made up of passionate people from all over the world, from all walks of life, and from all over the political spectrum. At VotingSmarter, we recognize that our political process is broken and that being an informed citizen is hard work; it takes too much time and emotional effort. VotingSmarter’s 2020 "dating app for elections" turned 4000 hours of boring political research into 4 minutes of "fun". VotingSmarter’s new Chrome extension turns countless hours of research into a tool for conscious consumerism. The businesses you shop at everyday use YOUR dollars to support THEIR values and political agendas. With the VotingSmarter browser extension, you can be sure your dollars are spent supporting YOUR values. Join our team to help us combine these two great products into a new platform in both web2 AND web3 and give people their political power back. We have an upcoming NFT drop and are starting to design a metaverse for politics. Leave your mark on the future of politics. Web3 Future When looking ahead, the discussion of Web3 is inevitable. While Samsung is still one of our main clients, our roster has evolved to include other globally recognized brands such as Adidas, PayPal, ESPN, Lego, Coca-Cola, Nivea, Starbucks and many more. Cheil Dallas serves as the lead agency for all Samsung projects in North America and is located steps from their office at Legacy Central in Plano, Texas. It’s the home base for more than 170 creative problem-solvers who share a passion for developing groundbreaking ideas rooted in data, driven by insights, and enabled by innovative technology. About You Who you are is just as important as (if not more important than!) what you can do. You have experience with software development, most likely in languages like Python, C++, Go (golang), or something along those lines. You can set up a project in GitHub, manage a README markdown file, and put triggers in place for automatically deploying branches to specific staging/production environments in your sleep. You are a proactive leader and problem solver. You’re naturally curious and strive to learn. You’re a good colleague who cares about the well-being of your team members. You work well on inter-team collaboration with product managers, software developers, data analysts, and account services. You probably make comments at happy hour like, “DevOps is more than just a sys admin who talks to devs,” or, “Here are ten reasons why I’ll take z-shell over bash,” or possibly even, “Isn’t it weird that depending on what branch of Amazon you work for, ‘continuous delivery’ can mean two completely different things?” If you go quiet on Slack, it’s probably because you are setting up automated unit tests with GitHub actions. About The Role Like you, this job is multidimensional. And every aspect is crucial to creating culturally relevant work. Collaborate with team leadership to understand project requirements and plan the best way to exceed them. Work with developers to create, manage, optimize, and integrate their development and deployment workflows. Troubleshoot operation issues across multiple projects. Develop solutions that can support large capacity and scale reliability Create and monitor the CI/CD pipeline and respond to incidents. Document everything. Deploy product releases working with external tech teams or through our own systems. Help scope new business opportunities, providing technical recommendations and estimates based on provided requirements. Manage, oversee, and help grow our junior and mid-level tech team members. Stay on top of the latest trends in our industry and suggest ways to keep Cheil an industry-leader. Participate monthly as a contributing member in the Metaverse Standards Forum on behalf of Cheil. About The Requirements You’ve got to check the boxes before you can think outside of them. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society. Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users. You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies. About DevU Sales The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products. What You Do As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack. While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results). Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers workflows. Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback. You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks. The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved. Skills & Experience Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company. Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support. Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers) Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements. Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have Dont meet all the requirements? Dont sweat it. Testimony of a) former) intern Hello ! My name is Zoé, I have been working at Avanade for almost a year and a half now. I started as an intern at the Digital Factory on March 1, 2021, as part of my end-of-studies internship and continued on a permanent contract. As innovation and the field of research & development were close to my heart, this year I had the opportunity to work 40% internally on innovative and exciting subjects by integrating the Tech Office. I therefore carry out two activities in parallel, namely my mission with the client (GRDF?) and my activities for the Tech Office. What are your missions at Avanade? As mentioned previously, I carry out two activities jointly: At my client, I developed a chatbot integrated in Teams, using Microsofts Bot Framework SDK. The primary objective of the bot is to answer employees questions on internal tools and services, and on the tools of the Office 365 suite, as part of change management within the company. I am currently working on making it more “intelligent” by incorporating cognitive language understanding capabilities – AI – so that it can handle multiple scenarios. Within the Tech Office, I had the opportunity to work on different projects and explore many innovative topics. I started by working on a demonstrator centered around industrial IoT and intended for a trade show in which Avanade participates, called SIDO. The project includes different technologies such as "AI at Edge", IoT, digital twin, mixed and virtual reality, robotics, low-code, data processing, etc. I also helped design the Innovation Center in the Paris offices, thinking about the offer for Avanade customers and employees, its format (the "Innovation Journey") and its content (the demos , presentations etc). I then explored the subject of the "Metaverse" by working on the design and 3D modeling of virtual universes, to finally focus on extended reality technologies (AR, MR and VR) as well as project management. and team. What do you like about your missions? What I like the most is their diversity, I like to discover a new subject or a new technology. I also appreciate the freedom and autonomy I have to carry out my research and develop my applications. And obviously, all these experiences are very enriching both technically and interpersonally. What do you like about Avanade? Having the opportunity to train and improve your skills whatever your level is a real plus. I was also touched by the benevolence and mutual support between the employees. How did you discover Avanade? What made you choose Avanade? I discovered Avanade through a friend from my engineering school, who was already on a permanent contract when I was looking for a company to do my end-of-studies internship. What made me choose Avanade is the training opportunity, as well as the missions that I was presented with and on which I was going to be able to intervene. What were your missions during the internship? During this period I also worked on two subjects in parallel, the first was the development of a dual mobile and desktop application using the PowerPlatform (low-code/no-code technology), intended to facilitate the integration and assimilation of the knowledge acquired by the new joiners during their onboarding, and taking the form of a game in several parts. During this project I went through all the stages of the life cycle of a project, namely, the analysis and collection of needs, the POC, the costing, the writing of a backlog and the implementation of an Agile methodology, the development, the tests, the production and the writing of a documentation. The second project was the development of an AI as part of an application to learn sign language in mixed reality with a HoloLens 2 headset. For this innovative project, I alternated between development and research phases /reading scientific papers. Still have doubts? See the opinions of our former trainees on Happy Trainees (anonymous survey). Lets keep in touch ! Every day, our 59,000 professionals in 26 countries make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers. We have been recognized as Microsoft’s Global SI Partner of the Year more than any other company. With the most Microsoft certifications (60,000+) and 18 (out of 18) Gold-level Microsoft competencies, we are uniquely positioned to help businesses grow and solve their toughest challenges. We are a people first company, committed to providing an inclusive workplace where employees feel comfortable being their authentic selves. We execute We are a performance driven company. We strive for excellence and are focused on pursuing best in class outcomes. We believe in accountability and ownership and know that our people are at their best when they are empowered to create and deliver results. Who We Are Mattel is a leading global toy company and owner of one of the strongest catalogs of children’s and family entertainment franchises in the world. We create innovative products and experiences that inspire, entertain and develop children through play. We engage consumers through our portfolio of iconic brands, including Barbie, Hot Wheels, Fisher-Price, American Girl, Thomas & Friends, UNO and MEGA, as well as other popular intellectual properties that we own or license in partnership with global entertainment companies. Our offerings include film and television content, gaming, music and live events. We operate in 35 locations and our products are available in more than 150 countries in collaboration with the world’s leading retail and ecommerce companies. Since its founding in 1945, Mattel is proud to be a trusted partner in empowering children to explore the wonder of childhood and reach their full potential. Mattel is recognized for the second year in a row as a Great Place to Work™ and as one of Fast Company’s Best Workplaces for Innovators in 2022. Visit us at https //jobs.mattel.com/ and www.instagram.com/MattelCareers . Mattel is an Affirmative Action/Equal Opportunity Employer where we want you to bring your authentic self to work every day. We welcome all job seekers including minorities, females, veterans, individuals with disabilities, and those of all sexual orientations and gender identities. ')

(176, ' 175 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead KPMG Canada Saint John, NB (Remote) Overview At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world. Overview Of The Opportunity At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community. KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries. What You Will Do As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives. Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices. Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally What You Bring To The Role Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc. Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space 5+ years in technology business development Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients This is a remote/hybrid position. KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business. Providing you with the support you need to be at your best For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here. Our Values, The KPMG Way Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. We welcome all qualified candidates to apply and hope you will choose KPMG in Canada as your employer of choice. For more information about Inclusion, Diversity & Equity in Recruitment, please click here. (182, ' 181 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead KPMG Canada Calgary, AB (Remote) Overview At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world. Overview Of The Opportunity At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community. KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries. What You Will Do As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives. Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices. Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally What You Bring To The Role Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc. Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space 5+ years in technology business development Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients This is a remote/hybrid position. KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business. Providing you with the support you need to be at your best For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here. Our Values, The KPMG Way Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. We welcome all qualified candidates to apply and hope you will choose KPMG in Canada as your employer of choice. For more information about Inclusion, Diversity & Equity in Recruitment, please click here. For general recruitment-related inquiries, please contact the HR Delivery Centre at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca. If you have a question about accessible employment at KPMG, or to begin a confidential conversation about your individual accessibility or accommodation needs through the recruitment process, we encourage you to contact us at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca or phone 416-777-8002 or toll free 1-888-466-4778. ')
(183, ' 182 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead KPMG Canada St. Catharines, ON (Remote) Overview At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world. Overview Of The Opportunity At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community. KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries. What You Will Do As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives. Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices. Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally What You Bring To The Role Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc. Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space 5+ years in technology business development Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients This is a remote/hybrid position. KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business. Providing you with the support you need to be at your best For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here. Our Values, The KPMG Way Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. We welcome all qualified candidates to apply and hope you will choose KPMG in Canada as your employer of choice. For more information about Inclusion, Diversity & Equity in Recruitment, please click here. For general recruitment-related inquiries, please contact the HR Delivery Centre at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca. If you have a question about accessible employment at KPMG, or to begin a confidential conversation about your individual accessibility or accommodation needs through the recruitment process, we encourage you to contact us at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca or phone 416-777-8002 or toll free 1-888-466-4778. (184, ' 183 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead KPMG Canada Swift Current, SK (Remote) Overview At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world. Overview Of The Opportunity At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community. KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries. What You Will Do As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives. Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices. Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally What You Bring To The Role Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc. Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space 5+ years in technology business development Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients This is a remote/hybrid position. (185, ' 184 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead KPMG Canada Saskatoon, SK (Remote) Overview At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world. Overview Of The Opportunity At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community. KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries. What You Will Do As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives. Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices. Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally What You Bring To The Role Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc. Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space 5+ years in technology business development Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients This is a remote/hybrid position. KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business. Providing you with the support you need to be at your best For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here. KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community. KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries. What You Will Do As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives. Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices. Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally What You Bring To The Role Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc. Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space 5+ years in technology business development Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients This is a remote/hybrid position. KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business. Providing you with the support you need to be at your best For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here. Our Values, The KPMG Way Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. We welcome all qualified candidates to apply and hope you will choose KPMG in Canada as your employer of choice. For more information about Inclusion, Diversity & Equity in Recruitment, please click here. For general recruitment-related inquiries, please contact the HR Delivery Centre at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca. If you have a question about accessible employment at KPMG, or to begin a confidential conversation about your individual accessibility or accommodation needs through the recruitment process, we encourage you to contact us at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca or phone 416-777-8002 or toll free 1-888-466-4778. (190, ' 189 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead KPMG Canada Windsor, ON (Remote) Overview At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world. Overview Of The Opportunity At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community. KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives. Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices. Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally What You Bring To The Role Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc. Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space 5+ years in technology business development Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients This is a remote/hybrid position. Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally What You Bring To The Role Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc. Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space 5+ years in technology business development Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients This is a remote/hybrid position. KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business. Providing you with the support you need to be at your best For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here. Our Values, The KPMG Way Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. We welcome all qualified candidates to apply and hope you will choose KPMG in Canada as your employer of choice. Overview Of The Opportunity At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community. KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries. What You Will Do As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives. Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices. The next big thing: We are doing today what customers will see as innovative tomorrow. Topics like NFTs, Sound Interfaces, LoRa, Metaverse and Metahuman are currently topics we are working on. Our Groundwork: We implement the full range of digital projects for our clients - from CMS, PWAs and mobile apps to 3D animations and deployment structures. Our style: We work on projects worldwide with teams of over 15 nationalities, our working language is English, we work on topics that move our clients forward and our people are good at finding the most efficient solution. No matter who you are, where you come from, what you believe, or what you geek out about, we bring people together to make great work. Thats what makes us THIS IS! Digital Media Group. (225, ' 224 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura ConsenSys France (Remote) Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society. Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users. You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies. About DevU Sales The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products. What You Do As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack. While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results). Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers workflows. Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback. You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks. The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved. Skills & Experience Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company. Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support. Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers) Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements. Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have Dont meet all the requirements? Dont sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think youve got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, were ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role. ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. (242, ' 241 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura ConsenSys Spain (Remote) Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society. Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users. You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies. About DevU Sales The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products. What You Do As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack. While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results). Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers workflows. Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback. You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks. The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved. Skills & Experience Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company. Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support. Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers) Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements. Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have Dont meet all the requirements? Dont sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think youve got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, were ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role. ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. ConsenSys is aware of fraudulent recruitment practices and we encourage all applicants to review our best practices to protect yourself which can be found (https://consensys.net/careers/best-practices-to-avoid-recruitment-fraud/). ')

Your career here will have a positive impact on people’s lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world. We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work. The team youll be part of Bell Labs Nokia Bell Labs is the world-renowned research arm of Nokia, having invented many of the foundational technologies that underpin information and communications networks and all digital devices and systems. This research has produced nine Nobel Prizes, five Turing Awards and numerous other awards. Education Recommendations Currently a candidate for Master’s/PhD degree in Aeronautical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Robotics, Systems Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Embedded systems, Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field with an accredited school in US. What You Will Learn And Contribute To A core service for the Industrial Metaverse is pose estimation, in which the location and orientation of physical objects such as robots, people, tools, walls are determined with respect to the environment’s reference frame. We are interested in developing vision-based techniques for robust object pose estimation in dynamic environments to enable applications such as autonomous robot/drone navigation and 3D physical modeling. Our collaborative work process combines algorithm development, system-level design, and hands-on experimentation to develop end-to-end prototypes that operate robustly in the real world. As part of our team, you will: Perform research and design algorithms for vision-based object pose estimation and associated applications. Implement and optimize algorithms in Python or C/C++ code Characterize the performance of algorithms in real-world industrial environments using cameras mounted on robots and drones. Collaborate with a wider team of engineers to integrate and refine solutions. What Is Nokia Looking For From Me You have: Practical experience programming in Python (preferred), C/C++ or Matlab. Expert experience in computer vision and related applications such as structure-from-motion, visual-inertial odometry, and visual simultaneous localization and mapping. Experience with machine learning techniques related to computer vision such as semantic segmentation, object detection and classification. Strong mathematical background with ability to learn and apply new technical concepts. Desire to collaborate with a globally disperse team and possessing excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Demonstrated ability to drive, influence, and implement new ideas. It would be nice if you also had: Familiarity with adjacent technologies such as wireless networking and communications, cybersecurity, 3D gaming engines, and user interface design. Why were awesome Nokia offers flexible and hybrid working schemes, continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered. Company Culture: We believe our people are our greatest asset and we aim to foster a fun, challenging, positive, and inclusive work environment. We offer 1-on-1 mentorship, learning and development opportunities, global impact and interaction, and flexible work/life balance. Meaningful Co-op Term: During your co-op term, you will have the opportunity to test out the latest technologies and work on innovative projects that could leave a global impact. You get to use skills learned in the classroom and apply it to real work situations while gaining professional hands-on experience. Nokia is committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity employer Nokia has received the following recognitions for its commitment to inclusion & equality: One of the World’s Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere Gender-Equality Index by Bloomberg Workplace Pride Global Benchmark LGBT+ equality & best place to work by HRC Foundation At Nokia, we act inclusively and respect the uniqueness of people. The Endpoint Specialist role predominantly works alongside our account teams to bring specialized endpoint consulting skills to maximize revenue opportunities by providing customer-facing in-depth business expertise and guidance. What youll do - what youll do You will be taking the lead, supporting sales engagements, and delivering or providing thought leadership, whilst working closely with our customers to shape their endpoint needs and ensure their business outcomes are met and exceeded. Technical ownership and delivery of end-to-end Microsoft projects. Working onsite or remotely to deliver projects for our clients. Work closely with our partners to deliver against customer outcomes. Na tou rorou - what will you bring? Ability to take ownership of deal closure, present, demonstrate, document, and provide thought leadership and stakeholder management in large or complex solution sales. Most roles allow flexibility to work from home and flex your hours to ensure you have time for those priorities outside of work. You choose how to save for your Retirement either via KiwiSaver(KS) or SuperCash (superannuation allowance as a cash allowance paid with your salary). You can change between these at any time. But as an industry, it has been slow, complicated, and disparate. While the tech world has moved into the future, the music industry continues to be shaped by inefficient systems of the past. Unlocking the industry’s full potential by unifying it all in one truly holistic space. Some might call that a Utopia. Funnily enough, so do we. Welcome to Utopia. Where music lives. Utopia Music is bridging the data gap by connecting global consumption, accurate metadata, and fast payments to an industry-wide trust platform. Our goal is to unlock creative value and enable Fair Pay For Every Play to make a better world for Music. The solutions we offer do not threaten to usurp the role of industry incumbents - it is about bringing transparency in the industry and supporting efficient royalty collection for all. You will be a key player, a strategic business partner providing IP searches and analysis to enable effective and informed decision making within Utopia Group. (256, ' 255 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura ConsenSys Russia (Remote) Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society. Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users. You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies. About DevU Sales The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products. What You Do As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack. While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results). Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers workflows. Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback. You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks. The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved. Skills & Experience Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company. Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support. Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers) Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements. Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have Dont meet all the requirements? Dont sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think youve got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, were ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role. ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. ConsenSys is aware of fraudulent recruitment practices and we encourage all applicants to review our best practices to protect yourself which can be found (https://consensys.net/careers/best-practices-to-avoid-recruitment-fraud/). Knows all of the nitty-gritty details of their feature/content, bringing anyone up to speed and ensuring no fine points are missed. Collaborates with Designers and Artists to deliver features and content that seamlessly integrates with existing systems and content. Works with the development team to ensure content and features are delivered to the highest quality. Coordinates with BI to leverage qualitative and quantitative data to optimize, iterate, and tune features and content that they are responsible for. Jumps into problem spaces to help create quick solutions or support existing development projects. Stays up to date by researching market titles; sharing knowledge of useful designs and experiences with teammates.
