(923, ' 922 --> Modern Workplace Pre-sales Architect avnade Newcastle, Northern Ireland, United Kingdom About Us Job Description Want to create value with digital and turn your ideas into human impact? So do we. At Avanade our vision is to be the leading innovator in Workplace Experience by 2023, creating impactful and motivational Employee and Customer Experiences through the power of the Microsoft ecosystem. We help clients to re-imagine their Workplace Experience (WX) encompassing technology, employee experience and business operations to remove cultural barriers, unlock new sources of value and drive sustainable growth. By joining Avanade’s Modern Workplace community, you will have a fantastic opportunity to operate at the forefront of technology, with access to global clients, on challenging and exciting projects. We are a diverse team, and we are proud of our culture that welcomes every individual. In our team you will find talented and passionate technologists, with a collaborative, positive can-do attitude. If you are the type of person who thrives on constantly learning and challenging yourself with a genuine desire to do your best, then you could be successful here. Our promise is to invest in you and help give you the platform for continuous learning and career development. About the Role: Avanade’s Modern Workplace Solution Area is responsible for making our Workplace vision a reality through three focused offerings: Workplace Platform Modernization – modernizing and extend the workplace technology ecosystem to protect against attacks, supporting new ways of working and drive increased business value. Workplace Value Realization – releasing business value through reimagined culture and employee experience, transforming business operations by reconfiguring how work gets done. Workplace Managed Services – managing and continuously evolving the workplace technology ecosystem to support new ways of working and deliver increased business value. Sales and solutioning for these offerings is also supported by a centre of excellence (COE) team that works with global, area (Europe) and regional (UK) offering, sales and delivery leads. To further grow our portfolio of services and revenues, we are expanding our Workplace applications pre-sales expertise within the UK Modern Workplace Value Realisation team by hiring a Workplace Collaborative Applications Architect/Subject Matter Expert (SME). We are looking for a Workplace Collaborative Applications Architect who is experienced in designing, solutioning and selling solutions that covers any combination of enterprise workflow, automation, AI, IoT and Augmented Reality leveraging Microsoft Office 365, Viva, Power Platform and Azure technologies. You bring valuable experience working with clients in a consulting environment, with solid technical architecture and delivery management experience. You are an experienced trusted advisor at the CIO / Senior IT Stakeholder level working within teams to undertake rapid assessments to define technology roadmaps and strategies. You have worked with clients and internal teams in a technical pre-sales capacity supporting sales development and proposal response teams with insights, solution approach, technical architecture, estimation and delivery practices. You have directly managed Technical Delivery activities, Delivery Teams and supervised the work of teams of Technical SME’s, providing technical guidance and leadership to achieve objectives. Responsibilities: Helping clients realise meaningful business growth through workplace transformation, you will work with account teams to shape, sell and coordinate the delivery of propositions that address client challenges in the areas of workplace strategy, workplace transformation, business operations optimisation and reimagined employee experience. You will also have the chance to: Understand business drivers, agree the optimum approach, and develop pragmatic, deliverable and sustainable Workplace solutions and roadmaps that allows clients to address their business needs and leverage the best value out of their Microsoft investments. Provide subject matter expertise in relation to workplace applications for front line workers in our priority industry segments, alongside workflow management redesign and automation solutions to help optimize front and back-office business processes. Contribute to the development and evolution of future focused workplace and organisation transformation propositions and solutions. Support the selling and implementation of workplace experience propositions in response to market demand and digital trends. Assist senior team members with sales efforts including development of client proposals and pitch mechanics. Delivering sales presentations to clients and responding to RFPs. Lead client engagements as a Technical Delivery Lead, responsible for the successful delivery of O365 and Power Platform solutions. Coordinate with and leverage offshore resources. Your skills: Significant experience architecting and supporting sales of application-focused workplace solutions spanning underlying cloud infrastructure, low-code/no-code-platforms, rich-client applications as well as employee experience and business improvement. Workplace applications strategy, lifecycle organization, governance and operations knowledge underpinned by Microsoft Office 365 and Power Platform. Sales and/or end to end solutioning accountability and track record for a pipeline of $1M+ digital transformation deals with demonstrable innovation and value creation. Solution design, integration, implementation/ transition to managed services including lifecycle management, applications factory (scaled application development and/or application in-take), service management and ideally experience optimization. Expertise in developing solutions for information workers by building informationarchitecture as well as leveraging enterprise workflow and business process automation tools. Knowledge of front line/customer facing worker applications for at least one of the following industry segments (Banking, Insurance, Retail, Manufacturing, Energy, Health Services Provision, Public Sector and Utilities). Experience of Agile Methodologies within Software Development. Appreciation of Microsoft’s industry Clouds and the Metaverse topic. Experience of working within a matrixed business spanning consulting and technology services and onshore/nearshore/offshore delivery centres. Experience in supporting the development, implementation, and deployment of innovative go-to-market strategies (supporting sales and marketing initiatives) across large scale services-based opportunities. Avanade UK is a proud signatory of the Tech Talent Charter ’ About Avanade Avanade is the leading provider of innovative digital, cloud and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Every day, our 59,000 professionals in 26 countries make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers. We have been recognized as Microsoft’s Global SI Partner of the Year more than any other company. With the most Microsoft certifications (60,000+) and 18 (out of 18) Gold-level Microsoft competencies, we are uniquely positioned to help businesses grow and solve their toughest challenges. We are a people first company, committed to providing an inclusive workplace where employees feel comfortable being their authentic selves. As a responsible business, we are building a sustainable world and helping young people from underrepresented communities fulfil their potential. Majority owned by Accenture, Avanade was founded in 2000 by Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation. Learn more at www.avanade.com . ')

We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our customers drive lasting value in this emerging virtual reality network that will transform commerce, customer experience and communities. KPMGs Content Creation team is made up of innovative designers who work together to leverage cutting-edge technologies to create new ways of working and interacting in the multi-industry digital world. what you will do Reporting directly to the Managing Partner and President, Digital and Innovation, the incumbent works closely with the Leader, Cryptoassets and Blockchain, Leader, Customer Experience, and other cross-functional teams using different virtual platforms to help our customers to carry out their projects in the metaverse. This includes informing clients, preparing proposals, creating engaging content on the metaverse, and sharing successful experiences on various platforms. He uses his experience and storytelling skills to simplify for senior leaders some of the more complex aspects of the metaverse and Web3 and propose strategies that will drive the success of current and future organizational initiatives. Successful candidates have a genuine passion for Metaverse, Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), Decentralized Finance and Web3, combined with in-depth knowledge of institutional industry practices. Although your activities will vary each day, here are the main tasks you will be required to perform as part of your duties Define and lead the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metavers working group. Lead the development of high-impact, visually appealing proposals that present thought-provoking ideas, engage clients and deliver added value. Advise clients on metaverse implementation strategies, including establishing and prioritizing relevant use cases, and experience design. Organize stimulating training workshops and demonstrations of virtual platforms used in various sectors of activity. Establish and maintain strategic collaborations with external organizations to identify concrete opportunities in this area. Design digital events and business activities in the metaverse for our teams, clients and communities; plan, design, facilitate and oversee the delivery of such experiences. Research and develop content that informs and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership, both internally and externally. What you bring to the role Passion for the metaverse, augmented reality/virtual reality (AR/VR) experiences and the underlying technology infrastructure. Active presence on several virtual platforms (Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces, etc.). Basic knowledge of the processes, tools and building blocks of Extended Reality (AR/VR), Metaverse, NFTs, Token Economy System and Cryptocurrency Wallets. Good understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and metaverse space. At least five years of experience in commercial technology development. Experience building, launching, sustaining and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement. Strong communication and collaboration skills, and the ability to speak at both a technical and a strategic level. Ability to lead multiple workflows and multiple assignments simultaneously. Experience in facilitation, storytelling and client presentations. The keys to your success KPMG staff members act effectively | promote growth | inspire trust and understand that a diverse workforce allows us to deepen our relationships and enrich the firm. Lead the development of high-impact, visually appealing proposals that present thought-provoking ideas, engage clients and deliver added value. Advise clients on metaverse implementation strategies, including establishing and prioritizing relevant use cases, and experience design. Organize stimulating training workshops and demonstrations of virtual platforms used in various sectors of activity. Establish and maintain strategic collaborations with external organizations to identify concrete opportunities in this area. Design digital events and business activities in the metaverse for our teams, clients and communities; plan, design, facilitate and oversee the delivery of such experiences. Research and develop content that informs and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership, both internally and externally. What you bring to the role Passion for the metaverse, augmented reality/virtual reality (AR/VR) experiences and the underlying technology infrastructure. Active presence on several virtual platforms (Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces, etc.). Basic knowledge of the processes, tools and building blocks of Extended Reality (AR/VR), Metaverse, NFTs, Token Economy System and Cryptocurrency Wallets. Good understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and metaverse space. At least five years of experience in commercial technology development. Experience building, launching, sustaining and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement. Strong communication and collaboration skills, and the ability to speak at both a technical and a strategic level. Ability to lead multiple workflows and multiple assignments simultaneously. Our Mission SAVI helps Veterans navigate the complexities and frustrations of transitioning to civilian life by providing benefits education, custom support and more as part of a suite of proprietary programs. Fun Fact About Us Our team loves supporting Veterans and working together to execute our mission! 100% of all contributions go directly to programmatic support. Be a part of the impact. What Youll Work On Ongoing marketing strategy support for 10-15 hours over the course of 4 weeks Support may include: defining your marketing goals, determining the right marketing channels, messaging your program, branding, or defining your target audience Note: We devised this project to connect nonprofits and volunteers for more flexible, more immediate impact. Your Responsibilities You’ll identify new business and project opportunities with new clients and develop and maintain business and project opportunities for existing clients. You’ll operate in an autonomous role, owning defined scope and outcomes, making aligned decisions centered in value. Being at the center of our clients, their wants, needs, worries and aspirations, you’ll promote a human centric mindset in everything you do. Thanks to your impressive expertise, you truly understand the needs of software and platform organizations, using your empathy and experience. What also motivates you? The will to deliver meaningful outcomes by developing market-relevant insights and a passion for designing, and implementing new solutions that integrate strategy, technology, people and processes. What We’re Looking Forward To Extensive experience in Software and Platforms or related, ideally experience or an interest in team management and talent development Know-how in delivering projects and programs with skills focused on client relationship management, value creation, delivery excellence and risk management Distinct understanding of data driven consulting through data literacy, data strategy and storytelling utilizing data points Interest in industry trends, and an ability to develop and bring market relevant points of view to clients Knowledge in Marketplace, B2B Software as Service, B2B Sales and Customer Service, Food Delivery/Ride Sharing platforms, virtual reality, augmented reality and the Metaverse Your perks at Accenture You are important to us as a person. This is something you’ll feel and experience daily, as our working environment is completely adjusted to you. Job Summary At KPMG, we believe extended reality is a new frontier that harnesses converging technologies to shape the virtual universe of the future – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which virtual reality, augmented reality, artificial intelligence, blockchain and cryptocurrencies will redefine the way we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the rapidly growing KPMG Content Creation team in Canada to help our clients navigate this new digital frontier known as the metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our customers drive lasting value in this emerging virtual reality network that will transform commerce, customer experience and communities. KPMGs Content Creation team is made up of innovative designers who work together to leverage cutting-edge technologies to create new ways of working and interacting in the multi-industry digital world. what you will do Reporting directly to the Managing Partner and President, Digital and Innovation, the incumbent works closely with the Leader, Cryptoassets and Blockchain, Leader, Customer Experience, and other cross-functional teams using different virtual platforms to help our customers to carry out their projects in the metaverse. This includes informing clients, preparing proposals, creating engaging content on the metaverse, and sharing successful experiences on various platforms. He uses his experience and storytelling skills to simplify for senior leaders some of the more complex aspects of the metaverse and Web3 and propose strategies that will drive the success of current and future organizational initiatives. Successful candidates have a genuine passion for Metaverse, Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), Decentralized Finance and Web3, combined with in-depth knowledge of institutional industry practices. Although your activities will vary each day, here are the main tasks you will be required to perform as part of your duties Define and lead the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metavers working group. Lead the development of high-impact, visually appealing proposals that present thought-provoking ideas, engage clients and deliver added value. Advise clients on metaverse implementation strategies, including establishing and prioritizing relevant use cases, and experience design. Organize stimulating training workshops and demonstrations of virtual platforms used in various sectors of activity. Establish and maintain strategic collaborations with external organizations to identify concrete opportunities in this area. Design digital events and business activities in the metaverse for our teams, clients and communities; plan, design, facilitate and oversee the delivery of such experiences. Research and develop content that informs and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership, both internally and externally. What you bring to the role Passion for the metaverse, augmented reality/virtual reality (AR/VR) experiences and the underlying technology infrastructure. Active presence on several virtual platforms (Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces, etc.). Basic knowledge of the processes, tools and building blocks of Extended Reality (AR/VR), Metaverse, NFTs, Token Economy System and Cryptocurrency Wallets. Good understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and metaverse space. At least five years of experience in commercial technology development. Experience building, launching, sustaining and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement. Strong communication and collaboration skills, and the ability to speak at both a technical and a strategic level. Ability to lead multiple workflows and multiple assignments simultaneously. Experience in facilitation, storytelling and client presentations. (951, ' 950 --> Frontend Engineer The Brandtech Group New York, NY (On-site) The Brandtech Groups Tech Team is reinventing the way digital marketing is done. Were looking for deep thinkers to help us reimagine and reconceptualize the future of brand marketing. This is a greenfield effort with the heart of a startup but the backing and heft of a global organization. Your products and designs will be used by some of the biggest brands in the world. (Unilever, Amazon, Google, Adidas, Marriott, Microsoft, many more). Come build cool stuff with us Overview The Brandtech Group is building a platform to integrate workflows and data across our content creation and media activation partners. With clients including some of the biggest brands on the planet (Unilever, Amazon, Google, Adidas, Marriott, Microsoft, many more) and a roadmap spanning serverless ETL, AI/ML, NFT creation and tracking, smart contracts and metaverse asset management this is a dream job for the right candidate. We have the size, greenfield and upside of a startup while being backed by one of the biggest brand service companies on earth. More About The Opportunity Were looking for an experienced UI/UX engineer to help build out the current POC into an enterprise product with a focus on building intuitive interfaces for asset tagging, addressability and discoverability with the goal of providing tools for performance analysis and data visualization. As the team grows you will provide technical leadership, guidance, and mentoring on design, code and strong engineering practices. You must be comfortable working in diverse development ecosystems and have worked independently in a rapidly scaling startup. Youll also be working on a modern stack: React, Redux, Apollo, GraphQL, Python (FastAPI), Docker/Kubernetes, BigQuery/Postgres and GCP/AWS. What Youll Do Build the Brandtech Cloud: this is a greenfield effort and a unique opportunity to participate in building a new product from the ground-up Expand the existing UX/UI: Make assets more discoverable by expanding Brandtechs asset analysis and visual intelligence tools Surface Insights: Bring together data from BigQuery and Postgres via Tableau, Looker and your own custom components to inform the creative process to enable more performant creative Help shape the product & technical strategy for the Brandtech ecosystem What Were Looking For 2+ years experience in at least one framework for building UI (e.g. React, Angular, Next.js, Express, Vue etc) Experience interacting with RESTful APIs and RPC services at scale Experience working on production services, with CI/CD tools and with cloud providers like AWS and GCP Good understanding and comfort with storage / caching solutions ranging from SQL databases (e.g. Postgres) to NoSQL systems (e.g. Redis) Excellent communication and collaboration skills Experience working being on or with remote / distributed teams Bonus, but not required: Experience in the crypto/blockchain space or a deep curiosity of the landscape Wed love to hear from you even if you dont have experience or interest in every bullet. Theres no perfect candidate and we want to find the right fit, even if its different than we imagine. We especially would like to meet underrepresented/underestimated candidates. What Well Offer Competitive Salary Family-Friendly Health Benefits Pre-tax commuter benefits Your choice of technical setup and equipment About the location Culture is a critical focus for our company and much of that comes from in-person collaboration and celebrating wins together. While were open to this role being fully remote, we highly encourage you to establish a home base at one of our offices in NYC (currently open). Collaboration and teamwork should be able to happen regardless of where your desk is, and weve got the tools to help make that happen. About The Brandtech Group The Brandtech Groups mission is to help businesses do their marketing better, faster and cheaper using technology. It was founded in June 2015 by former Havas Global CEO and Facebook Client Council founding member, David Jones. The Brandtech Group sits at the intersection of the dramatic growth in mobile, a tech revolution that has empowered people to create, produce and share unprecedented amounts of content, the impact of AI, AR, and blockchain, and frustrated global companies looking for brand- and tech-literate partners. Group clients include Unilever, Accenture, Google, Adidas, Marriott, Microsoft, Reebok, PayPal, Hertz, LVMH, Nissan Renault, Danone, Uber and Reckitt. The Brandtech Group is headquartered in New York and has offices in 40 countries & over 50 cities including Amsterdam, Bangalore, Bangkok, Bogota, Boston, Cape Town, Dubai, Geneva, Hong Kong, Istanbul, Jakarta, London, Los Angeles, Manila, Mexico City, Mumbai, Paris, San Francisco, São Paulo, Seoul, Shanghai, Shenzhen, Singapore, Sydney, Tokyo and Toronto. In support of our mission to help businesses build brands better, faster and cheaper using technology, we focus our operations on achieving excellence, speed and cost-efficiency. Our partners and team members and our operating companies all operate with speed and efficiency enabled by technology. The Brandtech Group provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training. (953, ' 952 --> [Rove/Metaverse Product] Community Manager Autonomous Inc Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam (On-site) This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more About Autonomous.ai Autonomous is a 7-year-old company based in HCM Vietnam and the US, building tools for the new world of work. Autonomous powers 1,000,000 individuals and 130,000 businesses across the globe, including Google, Netflix, Genentech, and Microsoft. About Rove.to With the vision “We see tomorrow’s web in 3D”, we are building ROVE for anyone to create a 3D space but no coding skill is required; all drag and drop. Rove is for millions of customers who want to lift their blog, shop, or portfolio off the page and into the new 3D web. All assets in ROVE are NFTs and purchased via smart contracts. Lets explore ROVE at LINK and bring it to the world! Joining us in this phase, you will be responsible for growing an NFT artist community. Artists play an important role in developing creative NFT arts and attracting more NFT investors into Rove for trading. The Job We’re looking for someone with experience building communities to join our team. The ideal candidate should be a ‘people person’ with excellent customer service skills and the ability to moderate online and offline conversations with our community. Ultimately, you should be able to act as the face and voice of our brand and manage all community communications and other social media channels. The scope of work includes: Develop & publish content on the Discord community, including writing a weekly newsletter, blog announcements, tutorials, and engaging content to drive social and community participation and inquiry about the project. Be responsible for answering tickets (questions, requests, etc.) and resolving users’ issues on Discord and other channels if needed. Moderate discussions and ensure conversations comply with the community rules and are constructive to developing the Rove community and product development. Plan and keep documentation for users’ surveys, feedback forms, and product demo notes. Be well-informed and understand very well Rove’s new project updates, features, and use-cases to give instructions to users and community members. Develop engagement strategies in alignment with marketing goals of driving Discord members and keep members active and closely involved with product releases and usage, including play testing, using features, and giving feedback and suggestions. Build a strong sense of belonging and exclusivity in the community. Participate in other relevant communities and events to boost our brand awareness; build relationships with other communities, crypto advocates, and influencers to promote our project. Organize online events such as community updates, AMAs with our community members, including written and verbal (audio or streaming) forms. Must be comfortable communicating in English. Continuously improve and evolve community-building methods. The ideal candidate would have these experiences and skills: Community management: Have a track record in community management, scaling community Discord/ Telegram and social media channel Twitter/ Reddit or equivalent channels (preferably worked with international communities) Customer-first: Have solid experience in customer service, assisting excellent customer experience. Be proactive and have a strong sense of ownership: proactive in exploring new mediums and new tactics to achieve goals on the bottom line. Be goal-oriented and obsessive with keeping track of goal delivery and performance. Tech and product savvy: A severe interest in software products, games, and new technologies, including cryptocurrencies, NFTs, etc is a big plus. Creativity: Ability to create engaging content and game mechanics to drive community growth and engagement. Effective communicator: Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills to effectively communicate with different personas across various channels and cultures, including internal teams and end-users. English fluency, both written and verbal. Minimum IELTS 7.0 or equivalent is a MUST Benefits: Highly competitive salary package with very attractive upside potential from ROVE token grants for team members Fun, dynamic working environment with talented colleagues and leaders from Silicon Valley to build great things for millions around the world 100% work flexibility with an unrestrictive leave policy. It is up to you to decide how and when you work and how you would like to take your vacations provided work is fulfilled. As issues may be caused by problems in wildly different areas of the code the chief responsibility is to coordinate the response to the issue and ensure it is resolved, pulling in engineers from other teams as necessary. On-call work is compensated with generous time off This is not a team that exists to be on-call. This is a team that elects to be on-call because it helps do the job better. Being on-call makes it easier and more motivating to identify opportunities to reduce the number of alerts the system generates. Operating, troubleshooting, and deploying software to Unix systems Requirements: Think about things in a systemic, methodical way, especially when troubleshooting Know when "This is good enough for the next 12 months" is appropriate Coordinate incident response across multiple teams -- clearly understanding and communicating what is going on, next steps, who is responsible for what, and so on Write code. (994, ' 993 --> IP Analyst (Hybrid/Remote) Utopia Music Zug, Zug, Switzerland (Remote) WELCOME TO UTOPIA Music is incredible. It can excite hundreds, and unite thousands. But as an industry, it has been slow, complicated, and disparate. While the tech world has moved into the future, the music industry continues to be shaped by inefficient systems of the past. At Utopia we believe there is a better way. Which is why today we are setting out to transform the entire industry; creating new revenue streams, consolidating the data and decluttering the admin. Unlocking the industry’s full potential by unifying it all in one truly holistic space. Some might call that a Utopia. Funnily enough, so do we. Welcome to Utopia. Where music lives. What Utopians Do The open secret is that the music industry is struggling with the very basics of music accounting: What was played, when and where? Who should get paid and how much? Utopia Music is bridging the data gap by connecting global consumption, accurate metadata, and fast payments to an industry-wide trust platform. Our goal is to unlock creative value and enable Fair Pay For Every Play to make a better world for Music. The solutions we offer do not threaten to usurp the role of industry incumbents - it is about bringing transparency in the industry and supporting efficient royalty collection for all. THE ROLE As IP Analyst, you will work on the first line, advising on all matters relating to IP landscaping and provide regular IP reports to different business and functions. As a key member of the BA – Intellectual Property team you will be a corner stone in achieving Utopia’s objective to Gain the Trust of the Industry, and will collaborate closely with our Strategy and Business Units. You will be a key player, a strategic business partner providing IP searches and analysis to enable effective and informed decision making within Utopia Group. You will collaborate closely with our inventor’s community to develop a first class WW IP portfolio, and with our Business Analysts to provide insights on dynamic market changes within the competition and other insights that positively impact business decisions and strategy, by ensuring all competitive IP intelligence is available and easily accessible to key customers, partners and other stakeholders. Responsibilities In this position, you will be primarily accountable for consistently and effectively: Developing and delivering regular analysed IP data, insights and reports, including competitor IP landscapes, threat assessments, strength positioning, etc. Conducting IP landscape evaluations to identify trends in a technology field, deliver IP competitive intelligence, identify potential new research areas, licensing and acquisition opportunities Preparing search reports and IP landscaping analysis and share with key stakeholders adapting the content to the audience Acting in providing support to develop and maintain a first class World Wide IP Portfolio Provide technical research and analysis with respect to patentability, validity, freedom-to-operate, infringement, monitoring of the competitive landscape in different technological areas Prepare search strategies to identify relevant patent and scientific literature in a given technology domain, and subsequent analysis Identify and report innovations in a specific technology domain through analysis of patent, product, and academic literature Provide support in assisting inventors with invention disclosure forms, refining/pivoting inventions if/when needed Assisting Business Units with innovation capture Review and provide technical analysis related to patent applications search reports. Requirements At least 3 years in similar roles with competitive intelligence and IP search - with advanced degree required in Electrical/Data Engineering, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field Patent/IP Agent/Scientific /Business Analyst - experience in search and patent literature Experience with patent related databases and proven experience in the patent searcher field is preferable Technical background/knowledge in data and databases, signal processing, music industry, gaming industry, new technologies (blockchain, metaverse, Big Data management, etc.) Proficient in MS Office including Word, Excel and PowerPoint Fluent in English, additional languages are a plus! Experience leading actionable and cross-functional strategic workshops What We Offer Great atmosphere - we live, love & breathe music & tech! Working in an impact oriented team and inclusive company culture. An experienced team to learn from, with proven track records in multiple startups and big tech companies. Our flexible remote policy provides Utopians the freedom to work either from one of our inspiring offices or from home. We celebrate being an international and multicultural company. Competitive benefits; packages depend on location. You’ll be given more details on this during the interview process. We are recruiting across the following of our European locations for this role (UK, Sweden, Switzerland, Finland, Spain, Germany, Netherlands) and can therefore only move forward with applications from those already based in these locations and with eligibility to work in the country you are based in. THE HIRING PROCESS You send us your CV in English We invite you for an introductory video call with the Talent Acquisition team to get to know you better and share more about us We invite you for a video interview with our head of IP and Licensing We kindly ask that you complete a assignment at home to be presented and discussed during a final interview with the team UTOPIANS As we want to bring transparency, trust, and clarity to the music industry we serve, we know a change comes from within. Utopia is a transparent, trust-based organization striving to have clarity in thinking and doing what we set out to do. We execute urgently and innovate to grow faster. We ship things that make a difference today, so we can make them better tomorrow. We embrace fairness and are all accountable. Strictly diverse and inclusive. We are an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate our diverse backgrounds and we welcome everyone who identifies with the above to apply. Welcome to Utopia - Where Music Lives! We’re eager to meet You! :) Utopia Music is a Swiss Music fintech company leveling up the Music Industry through clear, transparent, and reliable data-based solutions. We support the whole Industry to make more money, faster, with less costs, and less errors. In Utopia, the Industry sees market opportunities live. Investors elevate Music catalogs into a real asset class. Collection societies track more and spend less. Labels, publishers, and distributors simplify and enhance their business. And everyone gets Fair Pay for Every Play. Utopia is serving the music copyrights and the industry from creation to consumption, and will never compete against it. It means that we will never own copyrights. We will never be owned by the major stakeholders of the industry. We will never share or sell data of our customers to anyone else. ')

(998, ' 997 --> Senior Director, Digital and Innovation - Head of Metaverse KPMG Canada St John’s, NL (On-site) Insight At KPMG, you will be part of a diverse and dedicated team of problem-solving professionals with a common goal of translating information into opportunity for our clients and communities around the world. Job Summary At KPMG, we believe extended reality is a new frontier that harnesses converging technologies to shape the virtual universe of the future – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which virtual reality, augmented reality, artificial intelligence, blockchain and cryptocurrencies will redefine the way we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the rapidly growing KPMG Content Creation team in Canada to help our clients navigate this new digital frontier known as the metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our customers drive lasting value in this emerging virtual reality network that will transform commerce, customer experience and communities. KPMGs Content Creation team is made up of innovative designers who work together to leverage cutting-edge technologies to create new ways of working and interacting in the multi-industry digital world. what you will do Reporting directly to the Managing Partner and President, Digital and Innovation, the incumbent works closely with the Leader, Cryptoassets and Blockchain, Leader, Customer Experience, and other cross-functional teams using different virtual platforms to help our customers to carry out their projects in the metaverse. This includes informing clients, preparing proposals, creating engaging content on the metaverse, and sharing successful experiences on various platforms. He uses his experience and storytelling skills to simplify for senior leaders some of the more complex aspects of the metaverse and Web3 and propose strategies that will drive the success of current and future organizational initiatives. Successful candidates have a genuine passion for Metaverse, Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), Decentralized Finance and Web3, combined with in-depth knowledge of institutional industry practices. Although your activities will vary each day, here are the main tasks you will be required to perform as part of your duties Define and lead the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metavers working group. Lead the development of high-impact, visually appealing proposals that present thought-provoking ideas, engage clients and deliver added value. Advise clients on metaverse implementation strategies, including establishing and prioritizing relevant use cases, and experience design. Organize stimulating training workshops and demonstrations of virtual platforms used in various sectors of activity. Establish and maintain strategic collaborations with external organizations to identify concrete opportunities in this area. Design digital events and business activities in the metaverse for our teams, clients and communities; plan, design, facilitate and oversee the delivery of such experiences. Research and develop content that informs and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership, both internally and externally. What you bring to the role Passion for the metaverse, augmented reality/virtual reality (AR/VR) experiences and the underlying technology infrastructure. Active presence on several virtual platforms (Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces, etc.). Basic knowledge of the processes, tools and building blocks of Extended Reality (AR/VR), Metaverse, NFTs, Token Economy System and Cryptocurrency Wallets. Good understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and metaverse space. At least five years of experience in commercial technology development. Experience building, launching, sustaining and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement. Strong communication and collaboration skills, and the ability to speak at both a technical and a strategic level. Ability to lead multiple workflows and multiple assignments simultaneously. Experience in facilitation, storytelling and client presentations. (1000, ' 999 --> XR Senior Architect - Extended Reality / Metaverse (all genders) Accenture DACH Jena, Thuringia, Germany Overview Of Technology Innovation Our software engineers and technical architects get to build cool software systems. We’re combining technology, industry expertise, and entrepreneurial experience to massively disrupt our clients’ core businesses, in order to propel them into the future and create better products and experiences for everyone. You will be part of a team that is leading innovation in the VR/AR enterprise space by utilizing what is great about the game industry, while shedding some of its negative aspects. We do not crunch, our salaries are more competitive, our projects generally have shorter development cycles, and we do not layoff teams after projects are completed. Everyone on the team is self-motivated, has a positive attitude, and great interpersonal skills. Our projects are driven by innovation, not by necessity. If you are interested in a career where your hard work is always noticed and appreciated among a team of true professionals, then this is the place for you. Job Description Create World Class XR Experiences Work on interesting, challenging projects that have high visibility and impact Design and architect complex XR systems composed of XR frameworks, external systems and cloud services Support business development activities including solutioning, team composition, timeline and cost estimates Lead team of XR engineers and provide overall technical guidance Evaluate XR technologies and guide the team of strengths and weaknesses of different platforms Communicate and collaborate with other departments on technology solutions Perfectly balance pragmatism and idealism when solving technical challenges and meeting deadlines Advise and mentor other AR/VR developers Help define best practices for coding and software design Help plan and deliver technical training content for the department Continuously suggest improvements for the development organization Attend, participate in, and host the various technical training activities held in the application, etc.) Provide the work’s technical conscience, defining and driving the right solution to meet the technical performance, scalability, flexibility, operations and capability needs Follow estimating in proposals, planning and pricing Basic Qualifications: Minimum 10 years professional software development experience Minimum 4 years AR/VR development experience Requirements Ability to take a development project and start it from scratch Expert in time management, multitasking, and task prioritization Strong positive attitude (during the good and during the bad) Has solid understanding advanced XR elements like 3D modelling, content pipelines, shaders, animation and real time rendering.
